revision.text:
{{Infobox journal | title = Annals of Medicine | cover = [[File:Annals of Medicine.jpg|180px]] | editor = [[Timo Partonen]] | discipline = [[Medicine]] | abbreviation = Ann. Med. | publisher = [[Taylor and Francis Group]] | country = | frequency = 8 issues per year | history = 1969â€“present | openaccess = | license = | impact = 3.886 | impact-year = 2014 | website = http://www.tandfonline.com/iann | link1 = http://www.tandfonline.com/iann | link1-name = Online access | link2 = http://www.tandfonline.com/iann | link2-name = Online archive | JSTOR = | OCLC = 19550892 | LCCN = sn89036299 | CODEN = ANMDEU | ISSN = 0785-3890 | eISSN = 1365-2060 }} '''''Annals of Medicine''''' is a [[Peer review|peer-reviewed]] [[public health journal|medical journal]] that publishes research articles as well as reviews on a wide range of medical specialties, with a particular focus on [[internal medicine]]. The journal covers advances in the understanding of the [[pathogenesis]] of [[disease]]s and in how [[medicine]] and [[molecular genetics]] can be applied in daily [[Good Clinical Practice|clinical practice]]. The journal is published 8 times per year by [[Taylor and Francis Group]] and the [[editor-in-chief]] is Timo Partonen.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.tandfonline.com/iann |title= Editorial Board Members|accessdate=2009-10-23 |work=Annals of Medicine |publisher=Taylor and Francis}}</ref>
==Indexing and abstracting == ''Annals of Medicine'' is abstracted and indexed in [[Index Medicus]], [[EMBASE]], [[Biological Abstracts]], [[Chemical Abstracts Service|Chemical Abstracts]], [[Current Awareness in Biological Sciences]], [[Current Contents]]/Clinical Medicine, Current Contents/Life Sciences, [[Psychological Abstracts]], [[Research Alert]], and the [[Science Citation Index]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.tandfonline.com/iann|title=Aims and Scope |accessdate=2009-10-26 |work=Annals of Medicine |publisher=Taylor and Francis}}</ref>
== References == {{Research help|Med}} <references/>
== External links == * {{Official website|http://www.tandfonline.com/iann }}
